title: Tissue System R&D | 04 | Multilayer Tets | Houdini
description:
New internal infrastructure, additional wrinkles solved on skin solver pass.
More info https://vimeo.com/rodtd

There is no traditional skinning anywhere, all is driven by anatomical bones guiding muscle/fat guiding skin surface solver.
Solving time is 2.1 fps for all DOPs at once. (32 threads / AMD ThreadRipper CPU)
